column1: Baby Barnaby's////So when waiting to be seated and I'm thumbing thru the Yelp photos
column2: and one dish keeps popping up over and over--Green eggs with chicken apple sausage and potatoes.  There are literally hundreds of pics on the Yelp listing for this plate.  So on seated
column3: I'm wanting so desperately to order something different
column4: but then I realized that hundreds of people just can't be wrong.  Or can they?  Guess I was fixin' to find out!
